content: in this legal text a notary company called n is involved in a divorce case between two parties referred to as mr x and mrs x the couple has agreed on the terms and rights that will apply to both parties they have provided a detailed statement of their assets and debts and have agreed on the division of personal and household items they have also agreed on the use and transfer of certain items as well as the allocation of movable property the text also addresses financial accounts shares life insurance assets and pension savings stating that they will be allocated to the respective party whose name is on the account or contract the text further discusses real estate rental agreements and debts as well as income taxes fees and other debts stating that they will be divided between the parties the text also covers the rights and agreements in the event of the death of one spouse and the finalization of the divorce it addresses parental authority custody of the children housing arrangements and tax deductions related to the childrens accommodation the parties agree to make monthly contributions to a designated account for the childs expenses and share the costs of education clothing recreation and other expenses related to the child the text also discusses the division of extraordinary costs and the possibility of wage authorization for maintenance payments the parties have informed a notary about the assignment of service maintenance claims davo and acknowledge the rules regarding parental authority personal contact administration of the childs property and maintenance they agree to waive the maintenance allowance once the divorce proceedings are finalized the text also discusses the maintenance benefits for the cause including the indexing of contributions interest on late payments and adjustments based on residence arrangements the court has the authority to introduce increase reduce or abolish the benefit for spouses in the divorce decree if there are new circumstances the jurisdiction for any claims related to the family court is determined by the parties place of residence the costs and fees related to the divorce proceedings will be shared equally between the parties the parties declare that they have settled their mutual rights and obligations regarding joint property and renounce any further claims the clauses in the document will become effective once the divorce is finalized and the parties have confirmed their identity and accuracy of the information provided
